FileIndex.description: Search files, classes, and symbols in the IDE index by keywords. Faster than file system search, supports fuzzy matching.

searchType.description: 搜索类型:All(全部)、Classes(类)、Files(文件)、Symbols(符号)、Actions(动作)、Text(文本)

scope.description: 搜索范围:Project(仅项目文件)、All(所有地方,包括库)、ProductionFiles(仅生产代码)、TestFiles(仅测试代码)、Scratches(草稿和控制台)

DirectoryTree.description: Get the tree structure of the project directory. Supports depth limit, file filtering, and hidden files options.

maxDepth.description: Maximum recursion depth. Use -1 or 0 for unlimited depth.

filesOnly.description: Show only files, hide directory entries

pattern.description: File name filter using glob patterns. Examples: "*.kt" (Kotlin files), "*.{ts,vue}" (TypeScript and Vue), "Test*" (files starting with Test)

maxEntries.description: Maximum number of entries to return (prevents overwhelming output for large directories)

CodeSearch.description: Search code content across project files (like IDE's Find in Files). Uses IDEA's indexing for fast searches.

query.description: Search text or regular expression pattern to find in file contents

fileMask.description: File name filter using glob patterns. Examples: "*.vue" (Vue files), "*.kt,*.java" (multiple types), "*.{ts,tsx}" (TypeScript files), "Test*.kt" (files starting with Test)

scope.description: Search scope: Project (entire project), Module (specific module), Directory (specific folder), Scope (custom IDE scope)

scopeArg.description: Required when scope is not Project. For Module: module name (e.g. "frontend"). For Directory: relative path from project root (e.g. "src/main/kotlin"). For Scope: IDE scope name.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of matches to return

includeContext.description: Include one line before and after each match for context

maxLineLength.description: Maximum length of line content in results (longer lines are truncated). Set to a very large value to get full content.

FileProblems.description: Get static analysis results for a file, including compilation errors, warnings and code inspection issues. Uses IDE's real-time analysis capability.

filePath.description: File path relative to project root (e.g. "src/main/kotlin/MyClass.kt", "frontend/src/App.vue")

includeWeakWarnings.description: Include weak warnings/suggestions (gray highlights in IDE)

maxProblems.description: Maximum number of problems to return

FindUsages.description: Find all usages/references of a symbol (class, method, field, variable, etc.) in the project. Similar to IDE's Find Usages (Alt+F7) feature. Supports fine-grained usage type filtering.

filePath.description: File path where the symbol is defined (relative to project root or absolute path)

symbolName.description: Name of the symbol to find usages for. Optional if line/column are provided.

line.description: Line number where the symbol is located (1-based). Use this with column for precise positioning.

column.description: Column number where the symbol is located (1-based). Used with line for precise positioning.

symbolType.description: Type of symbol to search for. Auto (default) detects automatically.

usageTypes.description: Filter by usage types. For classes: Inheritance (extends/implements), Instantiation (new), TypeReference, Import. For methods: Override (子类重写), Call (调用), MethodReference (::method). For fields/variables: Read, Write. Default: ["All"]

searchScope.description: Search scope. Project (default): entire project. Module: specific module (requires scopeArg). Directory: specific folder (requires scopeArg).

scopeArg.description: Required when searchScope is Module or Directory. For Module: module name. For Directory: relative path from project root.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of usages to return
